output.sentences: As the school year neared its end, the students began giving their oral reports.
Marcus told a funny story about visiting potential colleges.
Susan reflected on career possibilites for herself and her friends.
Gordon expanded on his love of technology and electronics.
Everyone was very proud of what they had accomplished.
